name: Quick! Whodunnit?
description:
QUICK! WHODUNNIT?

Can you discover who is GUILTY? Better work fast, you don't have much time!

This game was created for the Constraints jam 2015.

The constraints adhered to in this game are: 30 second levels, the game must not have a tutorial and the game must have a single key control scheme, (you also technically only have one life per level).

Only 3 cases so far. Will likely update it with two of each difficulty soon.
